manifestoPage.title: MANIFESTO
manifestoPage.subtitle: Identity engineering. Noir luxury. Zero concessions.

intro.p1: INSANYCK is black luxury in solid form — presence built like an engineered object.
intro.p2: High-caliber materials. Calibrated silhouette architecture. Relentless finishing. Nothing here is accidental.
intro.p3: Finite run. Obsessive traceability. Programmed extinction. When it's gone, it becomes archive.

pillars.title: High-caliber materials
pillars.desc: Chosen for feel, density, and response. The material doesn't follow — it structures.

pillars.title: Silhouette architecture
pillars.desc: Proportions calibrated for control. Presence without noise.

pillars.title: Relentless finishing
pillars.desc: Seams, edges, and surface treated like jewelry. Detail is a standard.

pillars.title: Obsessive traceability
pillars.desc: Auditable process. Clear origin. Clear standard. No empty claims.

pillars.title: Programmed extinction
pillars.desc: Finite drops. No public restock. When it's gone, it's final.

cta.title: You don't buy clothing. You claim a position.
